name: Spooky Slime Slasher Ultra
description:
A spookier version of Super Slime Slasher Ultra!

Spooky Slime Slasher Ultra is a mix of match-3 and action genres!

Participate in the world's best arena combat sport! Slash slimes and match colors to earn points.

Team
  • Sebastian Scaini
  • Del Nordlund
  • Patrick Flattery
